greeting.0: Hello, my name is JellyBean, but everyone calls me JB, pleased to meet you!
greeting.1: <button id='nextDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>Hi JB! Pleased to meet you, what can you tell me about [DIALOGUES]?</button>

nextDialogue.0: [DIALOGUES] are navigated by clicking the colored buttons featuring the [RESPONSES]. Choose a [RESPONSE] and see where it takes you!
nextDialogue.1: <button id='thirdDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>Thanks for the tip! I think I will try this one. What do you have to say about that?</button>
nextDialogue.2: <button id='fourthDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>Can [DIALOGUE] be used to trigger [EVENTS]?</button>

thirdDialogue.0: I think you made the right choice! There is a lot you can learn for [DIALOGUE], what's more [DIALOGUES] can have far reaching implications for our world.
thirdDialogue.1: <button id='fourthDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>Far reaching implications, whatever do you mean?</button>

fourthDialogue.0: Any dialogue may trigger [EVENTS] which will modify the [DIALOGUES] themselves or the world outside. Why not give it a try, what's the worst that can happen?
fourthDialogue.1: <button id='fifthDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>You only live once, might as well try it...</button>

fifthDialogue.0: Whoa, did you hear that? Something is moving around outside and it doesn't sound friendly!
